Samples were typically injected for 1 minute at 100 μL/min and dissociation times of at least 10 minutes were allowed to estimate K<sub>D</sub> values spanning 1 uM-0.1 nM.
The association rate constant (k<sub>on</sub>) was determined by injecting a 2-fold titration series (in duplicate) spanning 550 nM-1 nM for 30 sec at 100 uL/min.
Antibody G1 Fab fragment at a constant concentration of 5 nM (aimed to be at or below the estimated K<sub>D</sub>) was used for solution affinity determinations.
